about_the_game:
This is an experimental side-scrolling idle game where the player can manipulate time to influence the progress of the game, and the game world will change over time. Over time, specific events will occur, and by intervening in these events, the player will change the landscape of the game world.

I wanted to create a game that would give players an almost infinite number of new experiences, so I used a lot of AI-generated graphics so that I could put as much effort into designing the gameplay as possible. However, since the game was developed entirely by myself and the production cycle was short, it seems to me that the game is still in a half-finished state, far from the richness of the content I had originally envisioned. So I plan to update this game for a long time and gradually enrich its game content.

A world dominated by slime, as time passes, they will gradually establish their own civilization, but at the same time, they will also face some crises. Different events will occur in different times, and you can intervene in these events and observe the results of all of them.

Click

Generate slimes through left or right clicking, which will be the key to intervening in this world.

Event

Events will occur at specific points in time, and whether to intervene in these events will affect the ultimate direction of everything.

Change

We strive to create a world that is constantly changing, and the changes in this world will depend entirely on the choices of players.

Endless

This game has no end, and when it ends is entirely up to you.

Everything depends on you

How to play this game is entirely up to you. You can freely make changes to the world in the game, even the game itself, or just hang it as a dynamic background in the background. Remember, it's all up to you.
